20.eng-name: Tribute, Spoils, and Rulership (Kitab Al-Kharaj, Wal-Fai' Wal-Imarah)

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying “Iraq will prevent its measure (qafiz) and dirham. Syria will prevent its measure (mudi) and dinar. Egypt will prevent its measure (irdabb) and dinar. Then you will return to the position where you started. Zuhair said this three times. The flesh and blood of Abu Hurairah witnessed it

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي إِيقَافِ أَرْضِ السَّوَادِ وَأَرْضِ الْعَنْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Making Endowments Of The Lands Of As-Sawad, And The Lands That Were Conquered By Force
